name: vscode-semistandard
description: Integrates JavaScript Semistandard Style into VS Code.
author: Dan Flettre

semistandard.enable.description: Controls whether JavaScript Semistandard Style is enabled for JavaScript files or not.

semistandard.nodePath.description: A path added to NODE_PATH when resolving the semistandard module.

semistandard.options.description: The JavaScript Semistandard Style options object to provide args normally passed to JavaScript Semistandard Style when executed from a command line.

semistandard.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the JavaScript Semistandard Style linter service.

semistandard.run.description: Run the linter on save (onSave) or on type (onType)

semistandard.autoFixOnSave.description: Turns auto fix on save on or off.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run update-vscode && cd ../eslint-server && npm run compile && cd ../eslint && npm run compile
